About.title: About
About.description: About FreeBoardGames.org, a free and open-source software project.

card.title: About FreeBoardGames.org
card.description: FreeBoardGames.org is a free (as in freedom), mobile-first, board game platform. Its goal is to popularize board games and to make them easy to play with friends, even from afar.

credits.title: Credits
credits.blox_font_used_in_logo_by_brian_kent: Blox font (used in logo) by Brian Kent
